get.summary:
Checks if the requested target languages are allowed for automatic translation based on the source language.
If there are no requested target languages, then all allowed target languages for the source language will be returned.

parameters.name: targetLanguages
parameters.description: Optional target languages. If not passed in, all allowed target languages for the source language will be returned.

isReactVersionEnabledForAutoLocalization.description: Is React Implementation of AutoLocalization Settings Enabled

isTabbedUIEnabledForConfigureLocalizatio.description: Is Tabbed UI Enabled for Configure Localization Page

isAutomaticTranslationToggleUIEnabled.description: Is Toggle UI Enabled for Automatic Translations

isAutomaticTranslationQuotaUIEnabled.description: Is Quota UI Enabled for Automatic Translations

isAutomaticTranslationAllowed.description: Indicates whether or not automatic translation is allowed for the target language.

isAutomaticTranslationEnabled.description: Indicates whether or not automatic translation is currently enabled for the game and language.

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetA.description: A response model for getting the automatic translation allowed status of target languages.

targetLanguages.description:
The target languages with the automatic translation allowed status.
The status basically says if automatic translation can be enabled for the source and target.

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetA.description: A response model for getting the automatic translation allowed status of a game.

isAutomaticTranslationAllowed.description: Indicates whether or not automatic translation is allowed for the game.

isAutomaticTranslationSwitchesUIEnabled.description: Indicates whether or not automatic translation switches are enabled for the game.

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetA.description: A response model for getting the automatic translation quota info of a game.

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetD.description: A response model for getting developer product icon

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetG.description: A response model for getting game pass icon

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetN.description: A model containing request for getting history of name or description.

requestType.description: The enum representing the type of request while requesting name/description history ['Name' = 0, 'Description' = 1]

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetT.description: A response model that contains game info for getting a translation count.

languagesOrLocales.description: The list of languages/locales of the game.

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.GetT.description: A response model for getting translation counts for a language or locale.

languageOrLocaleCode.description: The code of the language or locale.

languageOrLocaleType.description: An indicator that says whether the passed in language/locale code represents a language or locale. ['Language' = 0, 'Locale' = 1]

games.description: Info for the requested games, including their translation counts for the specified language or locale.

isGameProductsEnabled.description: Game products translation management page is enabled or not.

isBadgeIconEnabled.description: Badge Icon translation management is enabled or not.

isGamePassEnabled.description: Game pass translation management is enabled or not.

isDeveloperProductEnabled.description: Developer product translation management is enabled or not.

languageCodeType.description: An enum to distinguish between locale codes and language codes. ['Language' = 0, 'Locale' = 1]

isAutomaticTranslationEnabled.description: Indicates whether or not automatic translation is currently enabled for the game and language.

languageCode.description: The language code for the language to edit.

delete.description: An optional field used to indicate whether a language should be deleted from this game's list of supported languages.

startDateTime.description: The inclusive start dateTime of report in UTC

endDateTime.description: The exclusive end dateTime of report in UTC

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.Sort.description: A request model for sorting of image Ids for game thumbnails

mediaAssetIds.description: List of thumbnail ids in desired order.

isHumanTranslationProgressUIEnabled.description: Is translation progress for human translations enabled on UI

isAutomaticTranslationProgressUIEnabled.description: Is translation progress for automatic translations enabled on UI

isSupportedLanguagesChildLocalesUIEnable.description: Is Language Locales UI Enabled for Supported Languages

isFeatureEnabledOnUI.description: Is Translation Analytics feature enabled on UI

reportRequestPollingIntervalSeconds.description: Number of seconds to poll the server for report availability

minimumDateTimeForAnalyticsReport.description: Date-Time since the Analytics Reports can be downloaded

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.Tran.description: A model that contains the count value of a translation count and relevant metadata.

translationStatus.description: The enum representing a translation status. ['Approved' = 0]

translatorType.description: Gets or sets the type of the translator associated with the count, or `null` if the count is not associated with a specific type of translator.

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.Tran.description: A response model that contains category info for getting a translation count.

category.description: The category of the translation counts. ['InGameContent' = 0]

totalTranslatableItemCount.description:
The total number of translatable items.
The translation count percentage can be calculated by doing translationCounts / totalTranslatableItemCount.

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.Tran.description: A response model that contains game info for getting a translation count.

status.description: The status of the response for the requested game. ['LanguageOrLocaleSupportedForGame' = 0, 'LanguageOrLocaleNotSupportedForGame' = 1, 'LanguageOrLocaleIsSource' = 2, 'InsufficientPermission' = 3, 'GameDoesNotExist' = 4, 'GameDoesNotHaveTable' = 5, 'UnknownError' = 6]
The status of the response for the requested game. ['Success' = 1, 'LanguageOrLocaleNotSupportedForGame' = 2]

languageCodeType.description: An enum to distinguish between locale codes and language codes. ['Language' = 0, 'Locale' = 1]

Roblox.GameInternationalization.Api.Tran.description: A model containing a translation, translator, and translation time.

translationText.description: The translation provided by the translator.

created.description: The time the translation was provided.

isUniverseDisplayInfoAutomaticTranslatio.description: Indicates whether or not automatic translation is currently enabled for Game and Place Information for a game and language.
